name: Pyramid Puzzle
description:
Play as an explorer looking for the secrets of a pyramid! 

Game Gen - Ancient Technology game jam submission

FOR A BETTER EXPERIENCE, WE RECOMMEND PLAYING IT IN FULLSCREEN!

Controls:

[Arrow keys / WASD ]- Movement

[E]- Interact / Pick up / Whip action

[Q] - Explosive whip (once acquired)

[Spacebar] - Jump

[P] - Pause
